title: Monitor Overland Conveyor
description: A control room operator monitors a long overland conveyor that transports ore from the mine to the processing plant.

tasks.description: Review the conveyor's status on the control screen, checking motor amps, belt speed, and weightometer readings.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator confirms the conveyor is running normally.

tasks.description: Receive a 'Belt Misalignment' alarm from a sensor along the conveyor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator acknowledges the alarm, which could lead to belt damage if not addressed.

tasks.description: Dispatch a field technician to the location of the alarm to inspect the conveyor belt and idlers and make any necessary adjustments.
tasks.expected_outcome: A technician is sent to investigate and correct the belt tracking issue.
